businessGoals.goal: Reduce operational overhead from system workarounds
businessGoals.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 1: 'We spend more time running our systems than we do running the business.'】
【Rick, Transcript 1: 'We're getting about 17K in revenue. We are not making money to our presence on the web.'】

businessGoals.goal: Improve customer experience with proper shipping rates
businessGoals.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 1: 'Website gave me $15 in shipping... CCS converted the shipping to actual and it became sixty seven dollars.'】

businessGoals.goal: Eliminate multiple credit card charges per order
businessGoals.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 2: 'The impact to us, and we have lost customers over it, is a customer can get six charges, for example, on their credit card'】

painPoints.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 1: 'By not being able to hire folks, Except for them... You're essentially limited'】
【Rick, Transcript 1: 'Ability's website software doesn't handle... actual shipping. They don't see why you'd want to.'】
【Rick, Transcript 1: 'Our website does not talk to our... OMS. And communicate shipping. At all.'】
【Jennifer, Transcript 1: 'We have open tickets from the time we started in... 2019'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'We have to apply the entire $150,000 as a credit to their account and then manually go through'】

painPoints.issue: New customers not added to email lists
painPoints.quote: 【Jennifer, Transcript 1: 'They're just a new customer on their system and that's it'】

functional.requirement: B2B company accounts with buyer/payer/ship-to roles
functional.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 1: 'We have a buyer who's the person buying something. We have the payer... and the ship to.'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'Many of our products have at least four to five points of customization and those customizations affect the price'】
【Rick, Transcript 1: 'If Adobe Commerce has the outward facing view, but has an internal facing view for someone on the phone'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'One buyer, may be buying for 20 different locations... we have like 150 different locations'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'I want 1,000 of these and 500 of these, and I want them all to arrive together'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'We try to drop ship them so we don't have to touch the shipping charges both ways'】

technical.quote: 【Rick, Transcript 2: 'Shipper HQ... will let us build the shipping equation'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'We use Microsoft Dynamics for our accounting... How does all this point to that?'】
【Rick, Transcript 2: 'Our sales folks use Zoho to manage our relationships with customers and prospects'】
【Rick, Transcript 1: 'We email market. Twice a month, 100,000 emails going out'】

timeline.notes: Not seasonal business, can implement during holidays

budget.notes: Looking to consolidate spending for better ROI

competitiveContext.selectionCriteria: Found Adobe via Shipper HQ integration

uniqueChallenges.details: Buyer, payer, and ship-to are often different entities
Signs with radius, holes, finishing options affecting price
DOT placards, hazmat regulations, safety products
Stock items, custom production, and drop shipping

redFlags: Current system not meeting basic B2B needs
Losing customers due to technical issues
Not profitable online despite significant investment
Vendor refuses to implement requested features
opportunities: Improve customer experience to reduce churn
Enable proper B2B features for growth

businessGoals: 【Rick: 'We spend more time running our systems than we do running the business.'】
【Rick: 'We are not making money to our presence on the web. We used to have our own... we were profitable. We were just small.'】
【Rick: 'Our biggest obstacle is reaching potential buyers.'】
painPoints: 【Rick: 'The problem of going all in with one vendor is... If it doesn't work out, it's really messy'】
【Rick: 'They're supporting... One of the ways, by the way, the other way I came to look at Adobe'】
【Rick: 'We have lost customers over the bad handling of that.'】
requirements: 【Rick: 'Some of our products have four variables of customization.'】
【Rick: '70% of what we do is custom.'】
【Rick: 'One buyer, may be buying for 20 different locations. But with a central billing.'】
other: 【Rick: 'I bought some through Groupon... What the hell are they doing on Groupon?'】
【Rick: 'We're a very small business. We have 28 employees.'】
【Rick: 'We are B2B exclusively. We don't sell to people.'】
